channel.title: HellRising Season 4 Episode 7
channel.description:
Hello Moparians,
This is a private server for the famous game [b]Mu Online[/b]. A lot of the coding was and is being redone in order to perfect it. Currently we are in the stage of Beta. We are looking people that want to have fun playing and reporting any bugs/issues to us.
Website: [url=http://hellrising.eu/]http://hellrising.eu/[/url] Download: [url=http://hellrising.eu/?op=downloads]http://hellrising.eu/?op=downloads[/url]
You can find me in game (IGN Twins)
Information: .:: HellRising Mu Normal - PVP Server ::. ~ Version: Season 4 (Episode 7) ~ ~ Dedicated Server is basedin: Bulgaria ~ ~ Experience: 1000x ~ ~ Item drop: 60% ~ ~ Bless Bug : Off ~ ~ Monster HP: 10% ~ ~ Points per level: 5/6 ~ ~ Reset: From the site, Not deleted items and spells of inventory ~ ~ Reset cost: 100,000. x Reset. ~ ~ Max level: 400 ~ ~ Level for reset : 380 ~ ~ Points per Reset : Custom per Class ~ ~ Maximum resets: 300~ ~ PK Clear: From the site, worth 10 mil. Zen for a murder. ~
Server Features: ~ New Items ~ ~ New Pets ~ ~ New Events ~ ~ Custom Drops ~ ~ Custom Exp System ~ ~ Custom Party Exp ~ ~ Skill Three Master ~ ~ CashShop system ~ ~ PcPoint system ~ ~ Exl items drop system ~ ~ Level 4 wings ~ ~ 10 new Jewels ~ ~ AFK system ~ ~ Rewards system ~ ~ Stay online win rewards ~ ~ Characters evolution ~ ~ and much more... ~
Server Events: ~ Blood Castle + VIP ~ ~ Devil Square + VIP ~ ~ Chaos Castle + VIP ~ ~ Golden Invasion + VIP ~ ~ Castle Siege ~ ~ Illusion Temple ~ ~ Cherry Blossom Event/System ~ ~ CryWolf ~ ~ Happy Hour ~ ~ Halloween ~ ~ Hide And Seek ~ ~ Kalima ~ ~ Kanturu ~ ~ Red Dragon Invasion ~ ~ White Wizzard Invasion ~ ~ XMas Event - Santa's Map with NPC's ~ ~ and much more... ~
These are the updates we got done. v1.0:
+ Added Panda Pet + Added Panda Ring + Added SnowMan Ring + Added Golden Fennir
v2.0:
+ Added Minimap + Added 3d cam + Added auto afk system + Added glow + Added monster hp bar + Added Time ingame
v3.0:
+ Added Chaos Machine mix wings + Added Wings level 2.5 + Added Wings level 4 (all heroes) + Added Socket Support + Added Ancient Support + Added Offtrade + Added Guild vs Guild Fight Event + Added New Maps design + Reworked skills + Master Skill Three remixed (No Summoner Skill Three, This Season not support it full)
Update 4.0:
+ Fixed Sets bugs + Fixed display information + Fixed Ancient Kundum Drop + Event Rewards Changed + Added Quest System + Added Zen Map Configs + Added 65 000 Stats Support (1% bug) + Added HP Bar display PVP
Update 5.0:
+ Added Reward for online time + Added Information on login + Screenshots save + Minimap enable/disable + Added the new jewels option + Fixed new jewel text display + Option for custom shop item prices
Update 6.0:
+ Added Offtrade commands + Added Offtrade message global + /offexpoing - exit game and sell for PcPoint + /offzen - exit game and sell for Zen + /offwcoin - exit game and sell for CashShop
Update 7.0:
+ Added ingame /pkclear + Added ingame /reset (reset * points, no clear inventory)
Dark Wizzard = 300 Dark Knight = 300 Elf = 300 Summoner = 300 Magic Gladiator = 400 Dark Lord = 450 Bonus PcPoint on res = 1
Update 8.0:
+ Added Summoner to learn some of DW skills + Added auto afk system control panel F9 - Menu Option F6 - Enable auto afk F8 - Disable auto afk
Update 9.0 :
+ Added Custom Reward Golden Archer 1 Rena - Jewel of Bless 1 Rena - Jewel of Chaos 1 Rena - Jewel of Soul 1 Rena - Jewel of Creation 1 Rena - Jewel of Life ( It will drop you random item of them ) + Added Kundun Boss in Lorencia (drop ancient)
Update 10.0:
+ Reworked Eventitembags + Reworked Shops items + Reworked Event Rewards + Reworked Drop rates + Reworked Golden Monsters
Update 11.0:
+ Added Custom Drop from All Golden Monsters + Added Red Dragon Custom Drop + Ancient + Added Red Dragon Kill - 20 Pc Points receive (big) + Added Kundun Boss Lorencia stats (Hard to kill) + Added Red Dragon stats (Hard to kill)
Update 12.0:
+ Added Mace of the King + PowerUp item Mace of the King (min dmg 120, max dmg 200) Item requires Dark Lord + Exc. Items drop from Strong Monsters Only + Crash Client Fixed (no more disconnect) + Fixed skills use on all chars
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/20kex4i.jpg[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2qv59wp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/sqpfd5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/33emyb5.jpg%3C/b%3E%3Cb%3E[/img]

item.title: HellRising Season 4 Episode 7
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

Hello Moparians,

This is a private server for the famous game Mu Online.
A lot of the coding was and is being redone in order to perfect it.
Currently we are in the stage of Beta.
We are looking people that want to have fun playing and reporting any bugs/issues to us.

Website: http://hellrising.eu/
Download: http://hellrising.eu/?op=downloads

You can find me in game (IGN Twins)

Information:
.:: HellRising Mu Normal - PVP Server ::.
~ Version: Season 4 (Episode 7) ~
~ Dedicated Server is basedin: Bulgaria ~
~ Experience: 1000x ~
~ Item drop: 60% ~
~ Bless Bug : Off ~
~ Monster HP: 10% ~
~ Points per level: 5/6 ~
~ Reset: From the site, Not deleted items and spells of inventory ~
~ Reset cost: 100,000. x Reset. ~
~ Max level: 400 ~
~ Level for reset : 380 ~
~ Points per Reset : Custom per Class ~
~ Maximum resets: 300~
~ PK Clear: From the site, worth 10 mil. Zen for a murder. ~

Server Features:
~ New Items ~
~ New Pets ~
~ New Events ~
~ Custom Drops ~
~ Custom Exp System ~
~ Custom Party Exp ~
~ Skill Three Master ~
~ CashShop system ~
~ PcPoint system ~
~ Exl items drop system ~
~ Level 4 wings ~
~ 10 new Jewels ~
~ AFK system ~
~ Rewards system ~
~ Stay online win rewards ~
~ Characters evolution ~
~ and much more… ~

Server Events:
~ Blood Castle + VIP ~
~ Devil Square + VIP ~
~ Chaos Castle + VIP ~
~ Golden Invasion + VIP ~
~ Castle Siege ~
~ Illusion Temple ~
~ Cherry Blossom Event/System ~
~ CryWolf ~
~ Happy Hour ~
~ Halloween ~
~ Hide And Seek ~
~ Kalima ~
~ Kanturu ~
~ Red Dragon Invasion ~
~ White Wizzard Invasion ~
~ XMas Event - Santa’s Map with NPC’s ~
~ and much more… ~

These are the updates we got done.
v1.0:

  • Added Panda Pet
  • Added Panda Ring
  • Added SnowMan Ring
  • Added Golden Fennir

v2.0:

  • Added Minimap
  • Added 3d cam
  • Added auto afk system
  • Added glow
  • Added monster hp bar
  • Added Time ingame

v3.0:

  • Added Chaos Machine mix wings
  • Added Wings level 2.5
  • Added Wings level 4 (all heroes)
  • Added Socket Support
  • Added Ancient Support
  • Added Offtrade
  • Added Guild vs Guild Fight Event
  • Added New Maps design
  • Reworked skills
  • Master Skill Three remixed (No Summoner Skill Three, This Season not support it full)

Update 4.0:

  • Fixed Sets bugs
  • Fixed display information
  • Fixed Ancient Kundum Drop
  • Event Rewards Changed
  • Added Quest System
  • Added Zen Map Configs
  • Added 65 000 Stats Support (1% bug)
  • Added HP Bar display PVP

Update 5.0:

  • Added Reward for online time
  • Added Information on login
  • Screenshots save
  • Minimap enable/disable
  • Added the new jewels option
  • Fixed new jewel text display
  • Option for custom shop item prices

Update 6.0:

  • Added Offtrade commands
  • Added Offtrade message global
  • /offexpoing - exit game and sell for PcPoint
  • /offzen - exit game and sell for Zen
  • /offwcoin - exit game and sell for CashShop

Update 7.0:

  • Added ingame /pkclear
  • Added ingame /reset (reset * points, no clear inventory)

Dark Wizzard = 300
Dark Knight = 300
Elf = 300
Summoner = 300
Magic Gladiator = 400
Dark Lord = 450
Bonus PcPoint on res = 1

Update 8.0:

  • Added Summoner to learn some of DW skills
  • Added auto afk system control panel
    F9 - Menu Option
    F6 - Enable auto afk
    F8 - Disable auto afk

Update 9.0 :

  • Added Custom Reward Golden Archer
    1 Rena - Jewel of Bless
    1 Rena - Jewel of Chaos
    1 Rena - Jewel of Soul
    1 Rena - Jewel of Creation
    1 Rena - Jewel of Life
    ( It will drop you random item of them )
  • Added Kundun Boss in Lorencia (drop ancient)

Update 10.0:

  • Reworked Eventitembags
  • Reworked Shops items
  • Reworked Event Rewards
  • Reworked Drop rates
  • Reworked Golden Monsters

Update 11.0:

  • Added Custom Drop from All Golden Monsters
  • Added Red Dragon Custom Drop + Ancient
  • Added Red Dragon Kill - 20 Pc Points receive (big)
  • Added Kundun Boss Lorencia stats (Hard to kill)
  • Added Red Dragon stats (Hard to kill)

Update 12.0:

  • Added Mace of the King
  • PowerUp item Mace of the King (min dmg 120, max dmg 200)
    Item requires Dark Lord
  • Exc. Items drop from Strong Monsters Only
  • Crash Client Fixed (no more disconnect)
  • Fixed skills use on all chars
